main event: A round, silver, glimmering disc-shaped object was observed descending, hovering, and disappearing over Waco, Texas and James Connally AFB, Texas.
interesting points: The object had a glowing color and was observed by both pilots of trainers and ground personnel.
The object reappeared 30Â° northwest, hovered, and then disappeared again.
Aircraft were noticed at the time of the sighting.
The sighting lasted for an unspecified duration.
The report indicates the object was probably an aircraft, as suggested by the witness description of its brightness and maneuverability.
sighted object: a round, silver, glimmering disc-shaped object
location: Waco, Texas and James Connally AFB, Texas
witnesses: pilots of trainers and ground personnel
